moves.1. d4: Always enjoy the Queens Gambit so pray for d4 d5
moves.2. c4: still like that c4 d4 combo
moves.3... g5: very odd - you realise you should win the game about now...
moves.4... Nf6: oh dear, pawn loss and horrible pin
moves.5. Bxg5 h6: terrible offers an easy retreat and can't avoid the pin
moves.6. Bh4 Rg8: even worse as look what follows
moves.9... Qxf6 10. Nf3: lets get those pieces out as that rook is still a danger
moves.11... Qe4+ 12. Be2: thank you - can develop my pieces while stopping a pointless check
moves.12... Nxd4: Happy to lose a pawn to get two knights off the board
moves.15. Qe3: good place for the queen this
moves.16... Qf6: very weird.  Bb7 would have been nice.
moves.17. Nd5: double threat of Nxf6 and Nc7
moves.25... Qxf7 26. Nxf7 Kxf7 27. Bh5+: shuld be forced mate i  think
nice to end it with a bishop mate
